text: Rufus Will Granderson I (August 13, 1936 – October 20, 2015), was an American football defensive tackle who played one season with the Dallas Texans of the American Football League. He was drafted by the Detroit Lions in the nineteenth round of the 1959 NFL Draft. He played college football at Prairie View A&M; University and attended Temple High School in Temple, Texas. He died in 2015 at the age of 79. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Players of American football from Texas Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Prairie View A&M; Panthers football players Category:Dallas Texans (AFL) players Category:People from Waco, Texas Category:Temple High School (Texas) alumni
title: Rufus Granderson
